long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Surf Smart is your ultimate AI-powered companion for smarter and faster browsing. 🚀 Designed to reduce information overload, Surf Smart offers a set of powerful features that significantly improve your web experience:

Summarize Websites Instantly: Don’t waste time reading long articles. Surf Smart automatically generates concise summaries of web pages, allowing you to capture key points in seconds. 📄

Quick Search Features: Find the exact information you're looking for without scrolling endlessly. Use our smart search capabilities to zero in on what matters most. 🔍

Organize Tabs with Ease: Keep your browsing environment clutter-free with automatic tab management. Surf Smart categorizes and organizes your tabs so you can focus on what’s important. 📑

"Ask Page" Feature: Have a question about something on the page? Use our "Ask Page" feature to interact directly with the content and get instant insights without needing to read every word. 💡

With Surf Smart, you can reduce browsing time by up to 40% and transform the way you interact with the web. Whether you're a student, professional, or casual web user, Surf Smart is the tool you need to navigate the internet more efficiently. 🌐

Why install Surf Smart?

Save time by getting direct summaries of web content. ⏰
Enhance productivity with streamlined tab management. 📈
Quickly access the information you need with smart search capabilities.
Interact dynamically with any page using the "Ask Page" feature.
Download Surf Smart now and experience a faster, smarter way to browse the web!

Surf Smart does not collect, store, or share any personal data. All interactions with websites are performed locally within the browser. For information on how data is used in AI processing with Groq, please visit Groq's Privacy Policy: https://groq.com/privacy-policy/.
